text: The Spanish Mathematical Olympiad is a competition in Spain. ==Competition at district level== ===Navarra=== Mathematical Olympiad in Navarra is the district phase of the Spanish Mathematical Olympiad in Navarre. It has been held continuously since 1992, under the supervision of professor Gustavo Ochoa. ==Contests involving several districts== Each year, classified students from Aragon, La Rioja and Navarra compete in a tournament called "Triangular de matem√°ticas", which is held in one of the 3 communities each year, between January and March. == References == ==Related pages== *International Mathematical Olympiad Category:Spain Category:Mathematics competitions
title: Spanish Mathematical Olympiad
